title: The Whispered World: Special Edition (GOG) Giveaway
description: Let me share a whisper about a giveaway that just dropped! Download The Whispered World: Special Edition for free via GOG! The Whispered World: Special Edition is a epic fantasy adventure game with gorgeous hand-painted backgrounds. Check it out!
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Click the "Go to giveaway" green button and you will be redirected to the GOG home page
3. Scroll down until you find the game banner.
4. Click the "Get it Free" button and login into your GOG account to unlock the game.
